title: 89.421 FOREST RESOURCE ASSESSMENT PRODUCTS AND SERVICES ACCOUNT.
text:
The forest resource assessment products and services account is created in the state treasury in the natural resources fund.
Money received from forest resource assessment product sales and services provided by the commissioner under sections 84.025, subdivision 9; 84.026; and 84.0855 shall be credited to the forest resource assessment products and services account. Forest resource assessment products and services include the sale of aerial photography, remote sensing, and satellite imagery products and services.
Money credited to the forest resource assessment products and services account under subdivision 2 is annually appropriated to the commissioner and shall be used to maintain the staff and facilities producing the aerial photography, remote sensing, and satellite imagery products and services.
